China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ 2024 年 1 月 9 日星期二 04:04:03 GMT 120
TikTok owner ByteDance in talks with Tencent, others to sell gaming assetsTikTok owner ByteDance said on Tuesday it is in talks with multiple prospective buyers of its gaming assets, including the world's largest video games company, Tencent , as the Chinese social media firm retreats from the gaming industry. Tue, 09 Jan 2024 02:54:29 GMT HGTEL6G3WFIRNLXPZUI2J7TFMQ https://www.reuters.com/markets/deals/tiktok-owner-bytedance-talks-with-tencent-others-sell-gaming-assets-2024-01-09/Josh Ye市场交易
Asian markets gain as global investors await US inflation dataAsia's stock indexes were mostly higher Tuesday after a tech-led surge on Wall Street as investors await the next set of U.S inflation numbers due this week, which could hint at when the Federal Reserve might start cutting interest rates. Tue, 09 Jan 2024 01:40:36 GMT SK7FGCM7ZZJ27DRFDB6PXNYECM https://www.reuters.com/markets/global-markets-wrapup-1-2024-01-09/Scott Murdoch市场
Taiwan ruling party candidate will maintain status quo, engage with ChinaTaiwan's ruling party presidential candidate Lai Ching-te said on Tuesday he would maintain the status quo if elected, and remain open to engagement with Beijing under the principle of equality and dignity. Tue, 09 Jan 2024 01:32:27 GMT JCTGKVJIQJKR7OYY55AMVT55SE https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwan-ruling-party-candidate-will-maintain-status-quo-engage-with-china-2024-01-09/Sarah Wu世界亚太地区
Taiwan defence ministry says it saw four Chinese balloons over Taiwan StraitTaiwan's defence ministry said on Tuesday that it had spotted four Chinese balloons over the Taiwan Strait on Monday, two of which crossed Taiwan island. Tue, 09 Jan 2024 01:11:54 GMT SRM5UKITN5NWFOSKIJF44J5BOE https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwan-defence-ministry-says-it-saw-four-chinese-balloons-over-taiwan-strait-2024-01-09/Reuters世界亚太地区
Dollar pulls back, bitcoin jumps ahead of ETF approval deadlineThe dollar paused its rally on Tuesday, as traders reaffirmed their bets for a slew of Federal Reserve rate cuts this year on the belief that inflation in the U.S. is slowing sufficiently. Tue, 09 Jan 2024 00:53:02 GMT BFPNTBH7YRPZ7CQK7WYG6JD3N4 https://www.reuters.com/markets/currencies/dollar-pulls-back-bitcoin-jumps-ahead-etf-approval-deadline-2024-01-09/Rae Wee市场货币
US Navy sailor given 27 months in jail for sharing military data with ChinaA U.S. Navy sailor was sentenced to 27 months in jail on Monday for accepting nearly $15,000 in bribes from a Chinese intelligence officer in exchange for photos of unclassified private U.S. military information. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 22:03:26 GMT RVYANAZ6MJKBJK2T35TRMJILCE https://www.reuters.com/world/us/us-navy-sailor-given-27-months-jail-sharing-military-data-with-china-2024-01-08/Reuters世界美国
